citations: Roy P. Basler, ed.,The Collected Works of Abraham Lincoln(New Brunswick, NJ: Rutgers University Press, 1953), 8:424-25.

footnotes.text:
1Abraham Lincoln wrote this note. Its date is unknown. According to Lincoln’s law partnerWilliam H. Herndon, this slip of paper was kept on top of a stack of documents in theLincoln & Herndonlaw office. The editors have dated the document using the beginning and ending dates
                  of Lincoln’s partnership with Herndon.Roy P. Basler, ed.,The Collected Works of Abraham Lincoln(New Brunswick, NJ: Rutgers University Press, 1953), 8:424-25.

structured_content.text: Notes regarding Filing of Documents, [9 December 1844-11 February 1861]1
